##  [Derivative Products Hedging Project](https://github.com/tsereir/Derivative-Products-Hedging/blob/master/pricer.pdf/)
Code: [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/tsereir/Derivative-Products-Hedging)  
A C++ tool for option pricing using Monte Carlo simulation and calculating Greeks.

Key Features:

- Simulates option prices & sensitivities.
- Supports multiple financial products.
- Reads product parameters from text files.

## [Multi-Cash Flow Derivatives Hedging](https://github.com/tsereir/Multi-Cash-Flow-Hedging-)
 Code: [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/tsereir/Multi-Cash-Flow-Hedging-)  
A hedging & risk management tool for derivatives with multiple cash flows.

Key Features:

- Constructs hedging portfolios with real calendar data.
- Computes optimal asset allocation.

##  [American Option Pricing](https://github.com/tsereir/American-Option-Pricing/tree/master)
 Code: [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/tsereir/American-Option-Pricing/tree/master)  
A C++ implementation of Longstaff-Schwartz for American option pricing.

Key Features:

- Uses multidimensional Black-Scholes framework.
- Reads input from JSON files.
